parameters.description:
**userName** - name of user - who owned website
, **host** - name of host to update

**limit** - wobjectslimit

 **bottomPoint**(it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]) - bottom left coordinates

**userName** - name of user
**topPoint** (it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude])- upper right coordinates

**zoom** - number, zoom on map (client)

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio wobject and posts moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check following

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: user name what feed needs to return

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - limit of returned posts*(by default - 20)*, 
**user_languages** - array of languages to return feed
----------------Infinite scroll---------------
*For infinite scroll, use **skip** or **lastId** param, preferably **lastId** *
**skip** - count of skipping posts*(by default - 0)*,
**lastId** - *_id* of last retrieved post

post.summary: Return list of waivio objects, all or by specified author_permlink(author_permlink)

parameters.name: Access-Host
parameters.description:
To get the object as it appears on the desired site, add the host to this header. 
 No need to add https://

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - limit of returned wobjects(by default - 30),
**skip** - count of skipping wobjects(for infinite scroll, default 0),
**user_limit** - count of users to show(by default 5), 
**locale** - locale of fields(by default - *en-US*.), 
**author_permlinks** - return wobjects by specified author_permlinks,
**object_types** - list object types with witch objects to returning,
**exclude_object_types** - list object types without witch objects to returning, (if use **object_types** then ignore **exclude_object_types**)
**required_fields** - which fields add to returning objects,
**sample** - boolean flag, to return only 5 from top 100 wobjects
**map** - object with coordinates and radius, need to display restaurants at map. Map includes property coordinates - it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]

200.description:
**hasMore** - Boolean flag of of existing more wobjects,
**wobjects** - array of Waivio objects

, 
**newsFilter** - filter's permlink on which we will look for experts(*default* null), display experts by a specific filter

post.summary: Search objects by prefix of "name" field

parameters.name: Access-Host
parameters.description:
To get the object as it appears on the desired site, add the host to this header. 
 No need to add https://

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject moderation

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**search_string** - pattern for search wobjects, 
**object_type** - filter to search only specified type,
**locale** - locale for end formatting wobject fields(by default - en-US), 
**limit** - limit of returned wobjects,
**skip** - count of skipping wobjects,
**sortByApp** - change priority for cruical wobjects by specified App,
**required_fields** - array of filds to include in result wobjects
**tagCategory** - for filter by tags
 **userName** - name of user for fill campaigns 
 **simplified** - flag for simplified response
 **map** -  object with coordinates and radius, need to display restaurants at map. Map includes property coordinates - it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]
 **sort** - field for sort wobjects - valid: createdAt, weight, default - weight
 
**topPoint** (it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude])- upper right coordinates 
 **bottomPoint**(it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]) - bottom left coordinates
 **addHashtag** - boolean - if true add hashtag on wobj search(for sites)

post.summary: Search objects by prefix of "name" field

parameters.name: Access-Host
parameters.description:
To get the object as it appears on the desired site, add the host to this header. 
 No need to add https://

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**search_string** - pattern for search wobjects, 
**object_type** - filter to search only specified type,
**locale** - locale for end formatting wobject fields(by default - en-US), 
**limit** - limit of returned wobjects,
**skip** - count of skipping wobjects,
**sortByApp** - change priority for cruical wobjects by specified App,
**required_fields** - array of filds to include in result wobjects
**tagCategory** - for filter by tags
 **userName** - name of user for fill campaigns 
 **simplified** - flag for simplified response
 **map** -  object with coordinates and radius, need to display restaurants at map. Map includes property coordinates - it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]
 **sort** - field for sort wobjects - valid: createdAt, weight, default - weight
 
**topPoint** (it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude])- upper right coordinates 
 **bottomPoint**(it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]) - bottom left coordinates
 **addHashtag** - boolean - if true add hashtag on wobj search(for sites)

**skip** - count of skipping wobjects,
**sortByApp** - change priority for cruical wobjects by specified App,
**required_fields** - array of filds to include in result wobjects
**tagCategory** - for filter by tags
 **userName** - name of user for fill campaigns 
 **simplified** - flag for simplified response
 **map** -  object with coordinates and radius, need to display restaurants at map. Map includes property coordinates - it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]
 **sort** - field for sort wobjects - valid: createdAt, weight, default - weight
 
**topPoint** (it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude])- upper right coordinates 
 **bottomPoint**(it is array with numbers [longitude, latitude]) - bottom left coordinates
 **addHashtag** - boolean - if true add hashtag on wobj search(for sites)

parameters.description: Name of user to check for following

get.summary: Return post comments and other details. Comments placed at "content" key of result object.

post.summary: Return list of posts by some category(trending, hot, created, blog)

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: Specify app to enable waivio-wobject and posts moderation

parameters.name: follower
parameters.description: Name of user to check for following

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**limit** - Count of posts to return (*default* 30),
**category** - Category of posts(trending, created, hot, blog, promoted).

----------------Infinite scroll---------------
For infinite scroll, use **skip** or **lastId** param, for 'trending' and 'hot' - use **skip**, for 'created' - preferably **lastId**
**skip** - count of skipping posts*(by default - 0)*,
**lastId** - *_id* of last retrieved post

parameters.name: app

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**simplified** - boolean flag for simply result for map
**userName** - name of user, who make request
**wobjects_count** - Count of wobjects to return (*default* 30),
**wobjects_skip** - Count of skipping object(for infinite scroll),
**filter** - advanced filter for *wobjects* current *Object Type*,
**filter.map** - composite param, to find wobjects in radius
**filter.map.coordinates** - coordinates of point to search([**latitude, longitude**])
**filter.map.radius** - radius around of point to search(**meters**)
**sort** - Sort by "weight" or "proximity" *(if use proximity, require to use **map** filter)*
